import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[city,setCity]=useState("");const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const apiKey="bc81a3df1dd64d6d1231e7441f366144";// Replace with your actual OpenWeatherMap API key
const getWeather=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=".concat(city,"&units=metric&appid=").concat(apiKey));setWeather(response.data);}catch(error){alert("City not found!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83C\uDF24\uFE0F Weather App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:city,placeholder:"Enter city",onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getWeather,children:"Get Weather"}),weather&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:weather.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:weather.weather[0].description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF21\uFE0F ",weather.main.temp," \xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCA7 Humidity: ",weather.main.humidity,"%"]})]})]});}export default App;
